long_description: Lightweights for Wheels(TM) power reflectors are made from 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective material and can be placed on wheels of all kinds for visibility from all directions. Package includes 75 precut, pre-measured rectangles for spokes, 5 circles for hub ends and a teaser of 2 ovals and 4 circles of Lightweights stickers for clothing or helmet. 36 pieces installed on the bike weighs less than 2 grams. Power reflectors offer far more reflective area than a single spoke reflector, are visible from all directions, and won't fall off like standard reflectors. Lightweights are hardly noticeable until light hits the silver material and then it reflects a brilliant, powerful bright white light.
short_description: Lightweights for Wheels(TM) power reflectors are made from 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective material and can be placed on wheels of all kinds for visibility from all directions.
